member.name: M:nChannel.Framework.v1_0.Utilities.CSVParser.ConvertCsvToXML(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String[],System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Convert CSV file to XML
member.param: Standalone XML - Yes or No - Yes requires external references to be resolved

member.name: M:nChannel.Framework.Utilities.EmailUtil.SendMessage(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Transmit an email message to a recipient without any attachments

member.name: M:nChannel.Framework.Utilities.EmailUtil.SendMessage(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Collections.ArrayList)
member.summary: Transmit an email message with attachments
member.param: A string array pointing to the location of each attachment

member.name: M:nChannel.Framework.Utilities.EmailUtil._ValidateEmailAddress(System.String)
member.summary: Confirm that an email address is valid in format
member.returns: True if email address is valid

member.name: M:nChannel.Framework.Utilities.Files.ReadTextFile(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the contents of a text file. If the file doesn't exist, let it throw an exception.

summary.para: Description: Get a collection of the work flow available to an account
Description: Updates a collection of Work Flows
Description: Inserts a collection of Workflows
Description: Deletes a collection of Work Flows
Description: Get a specific piece of work
Description: Execute a Work Flow at a particular step
Description: Gets workflows for location for direction and transaction type
Description: Get Work Flows by LocationID, Direction, TransactionType, and ChannelID.
